modShortDescription: Remember the red HP bar that was shown off in A17? This mod adds that back into the game for folks who liked that idea.
modDescription:
Remember the red HP bar that was shown off in A17? This mod adds that back into the game for folks who liked that idea.

**[Download](https://gitlab.com/KhaineGB/khaines-modlets-a19/-/archive/master/khaines-modlets-a19-master.zip?path=KHA19-HPBars)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19558-khaines-a19-modlets-bigger-backpacks-backpack-buttons-hp-bars-etc/).

**Credits:** [KhaineGB](https://7daystodiemods.com/tag/khainegb/)
